greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * (A114810 * 0^(n-k))
formula: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * (A114810 * 0^(n-k)); where A051731 = the inverse Mobius transform and (A114810 * 0^(n-k)) = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A114810 as the main diagonal: (1, 1, 2, 1, 4, 2, 6,...) and the rest zeros.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 28 2009
